title: Polyester Adult T-Shirts for Sublimation, 6 Pack, White, Crew Neck, Short Sleeve
description: Material :This blank T-shirt is made of high-quality 100% polyester fabric that is comfortable, breathable, not easy to pill, and soft. At the same time, it also has good durability and wrinkle resistance, and will not lose its original texture even after multiple washings

Sublimation Printing: These t-shirts are perfect for sublimation printing. You can use heat transfer paper to transfer your designs onto the t-shirts, creating unique and personalized products. The sublimation printing process allows for vibrant colors and long-lasting prints.
Widely used:This polyester T-shirt is can not only be used for sublimation but also for heat press printing, screen printing, hot stamping, embroidery and vinyl
Size :This blank T-shirt comes in a variety of sizes, from S to 5XL, suitable for different body types. You can choose the appropriate size based on your body measurements to ensure a comfortable fit

Great Gift: These t-shirts are a great gift for friends, family, or coworkers. They are perfect for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. The sublimation printing process allows for personalized designs, making the t-shirts even more special.
